ComicInfo.Characters: Sex Police [Myrtle Splurge,Ana Kincaid,Jon's therapist,Bus Driver,Douglas D. Douglas,Suzie Dickson,Jon,Badal],Rachelle,Robert Rainbow
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-13T18:17:10 [Issue ID 4000-496428] urn:comicvine:4000-496428 Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-17 20:24:54. [Issue ID 1422513]
ComicInfo.Summary:
NEW STORY! NEW ARC! SAME OLD MATT AND CHIP. Jon and Suzie have a gift: when they have sex, they stop time. And they’re not alone. Get on board the book that’s been called “hilarious” and “arousing”— by Chip’s mommy. OH! All these issues? They’re all in a sealed bag because 1000 totally random blank covers have been “customized” by Matt and Chip. Will YOU be one of the lucky ones (thousand)? Will YOUR copy be worth a million dollars one day because it is one-of-a-kind and unique (probably not)? YES! (No.)
*List of covers and their creators:* | Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | |-------|---------------------------------------------------------|------------------------------|------------------| | Reg | Regular Cover | Chip Zdarsky | 1, 5 | | Var | Random Sketch Variant Covers (1.000 copies) | Matt Fraction & Chip Zdarsky | Missing | | Var | XXX Variant Cover | Bryan Lee O'Malley | 3, 4, 6 (Bagged) | | 2nd | "Very Special Second Printing Sketch Cover Wow" Variant | Photo | 2 |
Note: The regular cover was shipped in a sealed bag and sold at the regular price of $3.50, and there was a 1 to 35 chance to finding a special sketch variant with drawings and signatures from Matt Fraction and Chip Zdarsky. The XXX Variant Cover was shipped in another sealed bag and sold at $4.69.
ComicInfo.Title: Manime
